properties.creator: Sanborn-Perris Map Co
properties.title: Insurance maps of Pueblo
properties.description: 1 map on 54 sheets : col. ; sheets 64 x 54 cm
properties.note: Shows factories, commercial and religious occupancy of buildings, dwellings with property boundaries and house and block numbers.Microfilm edition known as: Sanborn fire insurance maps. Colorado.Shows building construction by hand coloring, loc1ations of windows and doors, and available water facilities.Originally issued as bound volume?.Sheets are numbered 1-52; title page and key map are on two unnumbered sheets.Covers Pueblo, North Pueblo, South Pueblo, East Pueblo, Bessemer, and Overton.Historical maps of neighborhoods, detailed at the block and building level, showing residential, commercial, and industrial uses of site, building footprints, potential environmental hazards, and construction details of structures.Includes notes on population, water facilities, fire department, and prevailing winds.
properties.funder: This project was funded in part through a Library Services and Technology Act (LSTA) grant administered by the Colorado State Library and in part by the Friends of the Libraries
properties.holdingInst: Map Library, University Libraries, University of Colorado at Boulder
properties.collection: Building Colorado Story by Story: The Sanborn Fire Insurance Map Collection

properties.creator: Sanborn-Perris Map Co
properties.title: Insurance maps of Pueblo
properties.description: 1 map on 54 sheets : col. ; sheets 64 x 54 cm
properties.note: Shows factories, commercial and religious occupancy of buildings, dwellings with property boundaries and house and block numbers.Microfilm edition known as: Sanborn fire insurance maps. Colorado.Shows building construction by hand coloring, loc1ations of windows and doors, and available water facilities.Originally issued as bound volume?.Sheets are numbered 1-52; title page and key map are on two unnumbered sheets.Covers Pueblo, North Pueblo, South Pueblo, East Pueblo, Bessemer, and Overton.Historical maps of neighborhoods, detailed at the block and building level, showing residential, commercial, and industrial uses of site, building footprints, potential environmental hazards, and construction details of structures.Includes notes on population, water facilities, fire department, and prevailing winds.
properties.funder: This project was funded in part through a Library Services and Technology Act (LSTA) grant administered by the Colorado State Library and in part by the Friends of the Libraries
properties.holdingInst: Map Library, University Libraries, University of Colorado at Boulder

properties.funder: This project was funded in part through a Library Services and Technology Act (LSTA) grant administered by the Colorado State Library and in part by the Friends of the Libraries
properties.holdingInst: Map Library, University Libraries, University of Colorado at Boulder
properties.collection: Building Colorado Story by Story: The Sanborn Fire Insurance Map Collection
